SELECT u1."ID", u1."PasswordHash", u1."Role", u1."Username", s."ChatID", s."UserID", s."ID", s."Name", s."OwnerID"
FROM (
    SELECT u."ID", u."PasswordHash", u."Role", u."Username"
    FROM "Users" AS u
    WHERE u."ID" = @__UserID_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS u1
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT u0."ChatID", u0."UserID", c."ID", c."Name", c."OwnerID"
    FROM "UserChatJoinTable" AS u0
    INNER JOIN "Chats" AS c ON u0."ChatID" = c."ID"
) AS s ON u1."ID" = s."UserID"
ORDER BY u1."ID", s."ChatID", s."UserID"

MessageTemplate: Reading chat messages (last:10, skip:0, polling:False, unreadNotRead:)

Properties.commandText:
SELECT c0."ID", c0."Name", c0."OwnerID", s."ChatID", s."UserID", s."ID", s."PasswordHash", s."Role", s."Username"
FROM (
    SELECT c."ID", c."Name", c."OwnerID"
    FROM "Chats" AS c
    WHERE c."ID" = @__ChatID_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS c0
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT u."ChatID", u."UserID", u0."ID", u0."PasswordHash", u0."Role", u0."Username"
    FROM "UserChatJoinTable" AS u
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u0 ON u."UserID" = u0."ID"
) AS s ON c0."ID" = s."ChatID"
ORDER BY c0."ID", s."ChatID", s."UserID"

SELECT u."ID", u."PasswordHash", u."Role", u."Username"
FROM "Users" AS u
WHERE u."ID" = @__UserID_0
LIMIT 1

SELECT m0."ID", m0."ChatID", m0."DestinationID", m0."OriginID", m0."Text", m0."Timestamp", m0."chatID0", m0."isRead", u."ID", u."PasswordHash", u."Role", u."Username", s."MessageId", s."UserId", s."ID", s."PasswordHash", s."Role", s."Username"
FROM (
    SELECT m."ID", m."ChatID", m."DestinationID", m."OriginID", m."Text", m."Timestamp", m."chatID" AS "chatID0", m."isRead"
    FROM "Messages" AS m
    WHERE m."ChatID" = @__ChatID_0
    ORDER BY m."Timestamp" DESC
    LIMIT @__p_2 OFFSET @__p_1
) AS m0
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON m0."OriginID" = u."ID"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT m1."MessageId", m1."UserId", u0."ID", u0."PasswordHash", u0."Role", u0."Username"
    FROM "MessageReadUsers" AS m1
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u0 ON m1."UserId" = u0."ID"
) AS s ON m0."ID" = s."MessageId"
ORDER BY m0."Timestamp" DESC, m0."ID", u."ID", s."MessageId", s."UserId"

SELECT m0."ID", m0."ChatID", m0."DestinationID", m0."OriginID", m0."Text", m0."Timestamp", m0."chatID0", m0."isRead", u."ID", u."PasswordHash", u."Role", u."Username", s."MessageId", s."UserId", s."ID", s."PasswordHash", s."Role", s."Username"

    SELECT m."ID", m."ChatID", m."DestinationID", m."OriginID", m."Text", m."Timestamp", m."chatID" AS "chatID0", m."isRead"
    FROM "Messages" AS m
    WHERE m."ChatID" = @__ChatID_0

    LIMIT @__p_2 OFFSET @__p_1
) AS m0
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON m0."OriginID" = u."ID"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT m1."MessageId", m1."UserId", u0."ID", u0."PasswordHash", u0."Role", u0."Username"
